124  private:
125  typedef Transformation::Vector6 Vector6;
126 
136  template <size_t dim>
137  static bool getRotationFromMatchedPoints(const PointsMatrix& src_demean,
138  const PointsMatrix& tgt_demean,
139  Rotation* R_tgt_src) {
140  static_assert((dim == 3) || (dim == 2),
141  "Rotation calculation is only meaningful for 2D or 3D data");
142  CHECK_NOTNULL(R_tgt_src);
143 
144  SquareMatrix<3> rotation_matrix = SquareMatrix<3>::Identity();
145 
146  SquareMatrix<dim> H =
147  src_demean.topRows<dim>() * tgt_demean.topRows<dim>().transpose();
148 
149  // Compute the Singular Value Decomposition
150  Eigen::JacobiSVD<SquareMatrix<dim>> svd(
151  H, Eigen::ComputeFullU | Eigen::ComputeFullV);
152  SquareMatrix<dim> u = svd.matrixU();
153  SquareMatrix<dim> v = svd.matrixV();
154 
155  // Compute R = V * U'
156  if (u.determinant() * v.determinant() < 0.0) {
157  v.col(dim - 1) *= -1.0;
158  }
159 
160  rotation_matrix.topLeftCorner<dim, dim>() = v * u.transpose();
161 
162  *R_tgt_src = Rotation(rotation_matrix);
163 
164  // not caught by is valid check
165  if (!std::isfinite(rotation_matrix.sum())) {
166  return false;
167  }
168 
169  return Rotation::isValidRotationMatrix(rotation_matrix);
170  }
171 
177  static bool getTransformFromMatchedPoints(const PointsMatrix& src,
178  const PointsMatrix& tgt,
179  const bool refine_roll_pitch,
180  Transformation* T_tsdf_sensor);
181 
193  static void addNormalizedPointInfo(const Point& point,
194  const Point& normalized_point_normal,
195  Vector6* info_vector);

198  void matchPoints(const Pointcloud& points, const size_t start_idx,
199  const Transformation& T_tsdf_sensor, PointsMatrix* src,
200  PointsMatrix* tgt, Vector6* info_vector);
201 
206  bool stepICP(const Pointcloud& points, const size_t start_idx,
207  const Transformation& inital_T_tsdf_sensor,
208  Transformation* refined_T_tsdf_sensor, Vector6* info_vector);
209 
214  void runThread(const Pointcloud& points,
215  Transformation* current_T_tsdf_sensor,
216  Vector6* base_info_vector, size_t* num_updates);
217
